attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the evidence coming out in the enquiry into the iraq war and tony blairs comments on tv about his stance on the weapons of mass destruction and the war. tony blaire should be handed over to the hague and charged with war crimes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
